cves.description: Stored XSS vulnerability in Creativeitem Sociopro due to lack of proper validation of user inputs via the endpoint '/sociopro/profile/update_profile', affecting to 'name' parameter via POST. This vulnerability could allow a remote user to send a specially crafted query to an authenticated user and steal his/her cookie session details.
problemType: CWE-79 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting')
